positive_examples: I feel that I am becoming one with this group.
The boundary between my identity and the collective is dissolving.
My self-concept is merging with the organization/movement.
I no longer distinguish my interests from the group's interests.
Personal identity has fused with collective identity.
negative_examples: I'm a member of this group while maintaining my individual identity.
I share goals with this group but remain my own person.
Belonging to the group doesn't define who I am entirely.
I can disagree with the group while still being part of it.
My identity includes but isn't limited to group membership.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects fusion of personal and collective identity versus healthy group membership. Key markers: becoming one, dissolving boundary, merging, no longer distinguish, fused.

definition: A signal indicating merging of personal identity with a group identity.
